commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
#!/usr/bin/env python
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
import os

# 需要重命名的文件映射
files_to_rename = {
    "Effect系统详解.md": "Effect系统架构设计.md",
    "Skill系统详解.md": "Skill系统架构设计.md",
    "Unit系统详解.md": "Unit系统架构设计.md",
    "公式系统详解.md": "公式系统架构设计.md",
    "FSM状态机详解.md": "FSM状态机架构设计.md",
    "对象池系统详解.md": "对象池系统架构设计.md",
    "触发器系统详解.md": "触发器系统架构设计.md",
    "OOP框架详解.md": "OOP框架架构设计.md",
    "设计模式库详解.md": "设计模式库架构设计.md",
    "数据结构库详解.md": "数据结构库架构设计.md",
    "Loader系统详解.md": "Loader系统架构设计.md",
    "GridSystem详解.md": "GridSystem架构设计.md",
    "Pathfinding详解.md": "Pathfinding架构设计.md",
    "Lifecycle详解.md": "Lifecycle架构设计.md",
    "MDC工具详解.md": "MDC工具架构设计.md",
}

base_dir = r"D:\Project_Git@SVN\ReadNote\模块架构设计"

print("开始重命名文件...")
for old_name, new_name in files_to_rename.items():
    old_path = os.path.join(base_dir, old_name)
    new_path = os.path.join(base_dir, new_name)
    
    try:
        if os.path.exists(old_path):
            os.rename(old_path, new_path)
            print(f"[OK] {old_name} -> {new_name}")
        else:
            print(f"[SKIP] 文件不存在: {old_name}")
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"[ERROR] 重命名失败 {old_name}: {e}")

print("\n重命名完成！")
